author: henridf
content: Fwiw to lighthouse peeps: while syncing nimbus on devnet-5 , i'm connecting to a LH node (16Uiu2HAmDoLmZYb2S36Z92xy1kZi2A6KvNWNeJVJ3DPvwvVwtxmJ) and making successive blocks and blobs by range requests.
